content: vogue knitting spring/summer 2008 design by linda cyr protect your skin from harmful rays with a sweet sun hat by linda cyr rounds of single_crochet at the crown and brim are bisected by a wide swath of scallop stitch difficulty level difficulty level 2 easy materials 2 spools each approx 150yd/137m j&p coats/coats & clark crochet nylon nylon in #16 natural size g/6 4mm crochet hook or size to obtain gauge sizes sized for small medium large shown in size large knitted measurements head circumference 20 21 22 /51 53 5 56 cm depth from crown to brim 5½ 5¾ 6 /14 14 5 15 cm depth of brim 3¼ /8cm gauge 20 single_crochet and 20 row to 4″/10cm using size g/6 4mm hook
